Class com.chimu.formTools.test.FormDatabaseTestAbsClass 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.chimu.formTools.test.DatabaseTestAbsClass

           +----com.chimu.formTools.test.FormDatabaseTestAbsClass
public abstract class FormDatabaseTestAbsClass
extends DatabaseTestAbsClass
This is the program that is used to drive the functionality for the UsingFORM examples. This is an abstract super class. All test cases should inherit from this class and implements the DatabaseTest interface. See Example:
